description: The General (exact name unknown) is a resident of the shadow town under the full moon. Together with http://anidb.net/ch39790 [his minion] he hunts people in this town, especially those who came there because they know too much about the Pandora Project. His body shows traces of his life style (bandages on head and leg), and he uses a crutch for walking.
name: Daishou
